articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Pete Buttigieg: Congress needs to be part of conversations on military strikes
articles.description: Mayor Pete Buttigieg joins Chris Matthews from the spin room. On military strike authorizations by the president, Buttigieg wants Congress and the American people to play a larger role.

articles.title: Shocking new evidence rocks Trump impeachment before Senate trial
articles.description: Rep. Jim Himes, member of the House Intelligence Committee, talks with Rachel Maddow about a new collection of evidence in the Donald Trump impeachment case that not only offers new insights into Donald Trump's behavior toward Ukraine, but exposes some shocki…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: New document release exposes Trump connections to Parnas, Fruman
articles.description: Rachel Maddow looks at what newly released documents and text messages show about Donald Trump and members of his legal team's awareness of and relationship to federally indicted Rudy Giuliani associates Lev Parnas and Igor Fruman.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Amy Klobuchar: Trump has run up the debt
articles.description: Senator Amy Klobuchar joins Chris Matthews from the spin room. On fiscal responsibility, Klobuchar says that Trump ‘has just made things worse’ when it comes to the national debt.

articles.title: Sanders, Warren decline to shake hands after sparring during Iowa debate
articles.description: Brian WIlliams and Claire McCaskill take a look at a handshake that didn't happen and the tense interaction between Sen. Bernie Sanders and Sen. Elizabeth Warren following the debate.

articles.title: Tom Steyer: Trump started obstructing justice almost from...
articles.description: Tom Steyer joins Chris Matthews from the spin room. On new revelations in the impeachment trial, Steyer says the president has been obstructing justice ‘from day one.’

articles.title: At final debate before first votes are cast, Biden and Warren remove their gloves
articles.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren and Sen. Bernie Sanders' escalating feud was brought into the spotlight during the final debate before the first votes are cast in Iowa. Brian Williams discusses.

articles.title: Despite past admissions, Flynn looks to withdraw guilty plea
